name: AO3 Plain
description:
Plain white and grey AO3 skin + dark color schemes. Link colour and fonts may be customized.

May also be installed using AO3's site skin feature: adjust the additional settings to your liking and install it in Stylish first. Then copy and paste the CSS from Stylish when you make a new skin in AO3. Remember to disable the skin in Stylish when you're done. Keep the default "add on to archive skin" option under the advanced menu.
additional_info:
July 2018: updated for new search filters, search form inputs
May 2018: minor styling for the "Extension of our own" extension (made light table backgrounds on the Subscriptions page transparent). 
April 2017: welp, userstyles.org fucked up all the style settings. (now fixed)
Mar 2017: styled the admin announcements, added work width setting.
Oct 2016: fixed corrupted style data
Sept 2016: new Groovy color scheme (dark brown ) and lots of bug fixes.
April 2016: added night mode.

discussions.name: Love it but how to install it directly as a skin on AO3?

style_settings.label: Max paragraph width of work page (AO3 default is 72em)

style_setting_options.label: Use text labels for warnings instead
Solarized Dark (dark blue)
Peacock (dark grey)
Groovy (dark brown)
